title: feat: Add GitHub Copilot instructions
description:
## Summary

Adds comprehensive GitHub Copilot instructions for this C#/.NET TDS protocol library.

## Changes

- Added project overview explaining TDS protocol implementation purpose
- Documented repository structure with architectural layer descriptions
- Added coding guidelines (naming conventions, code style, error handling, async patterns)
- Included testing requirements and conventions (xUnit, Moq, test organization)
- Added build and development instructions with common commands
- Documented best practices specific to this codebase
